column5: Buy the uninsulated jacket and use your own fleece. Layers are better anyway.
Sorry, I should have been more clear.  They are still on sale, but just not at the price they were last week ($100 for the parka and $90 for the bibs).

Thanks for the quick responses! I called Cabelas and yes the $99 sale is over so looks like I missed out. I'm still debating the purchase at the new price (and justifying it to my wife....i've already used the buy now, think later tactic too many times). If anyone did order one and finds that it doesn't fit or it's not for them, just let me know. I take a large but i'm not picky on size, I'll even take the 5xl if necessary. I'll just do my best Daryl Cronzy impression and eat all the fish i catch and the jacket should fit me in a couple of years.
its also free shipping and a free 60 dollar tackle bag
I see free shipping but not the tackle bag. Either my eyes are going bad or they've removed that part of the sale too.
put a jacket and bibs in your shopping cart and the tackle bag appears...
What size is the free tackle bag?

It's big, i can't tell you exactly because it's still in original package - this is from cabelas web site:  The Super Magnum Bag holds twelve 3700-series adjustable utility boxes. It holds one Cabelaâ€™s 3600 box in the front pocket and one 3600 box in each of the two side pockets. Two specially designed Storm-Proof external pockets for your camera, cell phone, GPS or VHF radio. Four external pockets, including three large mesh pockets. Dimensions: 27"L x 14"H x 12"D.
Big is right, I was quite surprised how big it was.
I've got that bag and it holds alot in fact I'm thinking of going smaller cause its so heavy to lug around.
I shipped mine to ny them picked it up  Ordered Thursday... Picked it up Tuesday...
drop down here lots of rain to play with today!

Came straight to my house in London, ON via Canada Post.  Was a pleasant surprise.  I am used to having to go to the local post office since they never actually tried to deliver the packages when I lived in Toronto.

Price went down again today - now the bibs and jacket can be had for $99 each!!!!!! My XL suit was too big - had to ship it to their return centre in Markham for an exchange - their XL is massive!!!!!!!!!!! (even with 2 layers of fleece). I am a stout, 5'8" and the Large is the right size. FYI, if ordering
Cabelas Guideware X300 rainwear is by far the best money can buy, you will not be disappointed!! That is a great deal @ 50% off.
Can I ask what your total was incl shipping and duty? I'm thinking of getting this deal.
Nevermind, I just went through the checkout to see what it would be. $300 total for bibs and jacket.  $20 was for shipping and $70 was for tax.  A good deal but still to much for me.
it will be 200 plus 70 = $270 (if u phone it in and ask for free shipping-worked for me)

For me:  Merchandise = $214.98  ($115 for the parka, $100 for the bib) - note: the sale was continued and the parkas are now $100 and the bibs are $90. Fee = $3.50 Postage = $19.95 Tax = $74.27 ORDER TOTAL = $312.70  Looks liked I paid more than I should have, but still a good deal IMO.
Wouldn't have anything to do with that rip I heard on Buckhorn eh Mike? (or the Frogs left in the boat on the highway)

Hey Guys,  Without this post, I wouldn't have known about the great deals on Cabela's guidewear products - specifically, the regular uninsulated jacket and the uninsulated tall bibs  Last week Sunday, I purchased the Jacket - $129 & Bibs - $109.  Today, I checked Cabelas.com and learned that the jacket is now $79!!!  I contacted Cabelas customer service - online live agent, and I am pleased to let you know that they providing the difference in the form of a $50 gift card.  According to the customer service agent, it is Cabelas policy to refund the balance, in a form of a gift card, if there is a price change within 7 days of purchase.  To all the folks that have purchased Cabelas products within the last 7 days and today find its price reduced - I encourage you to contact Cabelas.  Cabelas - you know what customer service is all about!  -Sawyer
I don't need a new rainsuit. But I'll in visiting two different Cabelas stores in about a week and a half or so. One in Owatonna Minnesota, and another in Kansas City Kansas. Can't wait.
Splurged on the jacket only, 99.99 plus 50cents shipping and shipped by usps, thanks guys! I did a phone order and she said the total was 115
Got my reels today, 1 week pretty good. Reels BTW are super smooth. They say daiwa all over them

Also getting a $25 gift card after I made the call.  Tried emailing CS, but that didn't get me very far.   Of course, now that I have a gift card it will most likely end up costing me more at the end of the day than if I just sucked it up, lol!!

Picked up my stuff today.  A word to the wise. For Cabelas "midnight/black" is dark blue and black. Clearly I did not look at the colour photo and only base my choice on the description.  Just noticed while I was checking my order to get the price difference refunded that on my order it is listed as night/black...  I don't feel too bad, I don't know what colour forest meadow is either.
I got a 25$ card too - thanks for the heads up on their 7 day policy:)
raingear is now 76% off
I'd like to see the link to that...  Only guidewear I found around that % was the regular jacket in 2-3-4-5 xl
my bad it was 67% sorry

Hi all. I'm late seeing this post and may have missed out on the sale! I tried to take a look on their website but I dont see any x300 parka's for $99. Can someone provide a link (if the sale is still on)? Thanks.

The sale is still on... But I never saw the prices some members are posting...  Heres the link to the uninsulated parka...   http://www.cabelas.com/product/Cabelas-Guidewear-X300-GORE-TEX174-Parka-150-Regular/1158402.uts?Ntk=AllProducts&searchPath=%2Fcatalog%2Fsearch%2F%3FN%3D%26No%3D20%26Ntk%3DAllProducts%26Ntt%3DGuidewear%26WTz_l%3DHeader%253BSearch-All%2BProducts%26WTz_st%3D%26WTz_stype%3DSP%26form_state%3DsearchForm%26search%3DGuidewear%26searchTypeByFilter%3DAllProducts%26x%3D0%26y%3D0&Ntt=Guidewear&WTz_l=Header%3BSearch-All+Products

Looks like it's over now.  They had some "hot deal" 4 day sale where they were 50-60% off (or something close), and then for some reason went on sale again not long after for another 4 days at an even lower price.  Call them up and see if you can get the sale price.  Just say your web order messed up or something

Nope... Sale is still on...  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Cabelas-Guidewear-X300-GORE-TEX174-Parka-150-Regular/1158402.uts?Ntk=AllProducts&searchPath=%2Fcatalog%2Fsearch%2F%3FN%3D%26No%3D20%26Ntk%3DAllProducts%26Ntt%3DGuidewear%26WTz_l%3DHeader%253BSearch-All%2BProducts%26WTz_st%3D%26WTz_stype%3DSP%26form_state%3DsearchForm%26search%3DGuidewear%26searchTypeByFilter%3DAllProducts%26x%3D0%26y%3D0&Ntt=Guidewear&WTz_l=Header%3BSearch-All+Products
not at $99 though like it was

Heads up to everyone out there! Cabelas has their premium raingear - Gore-tex Guidewear x300 - on sale right now at less than half price!!!!!!! Bibs (99) + Parka (115) They still have lots in stock but this usually changes quickly on their blowout deals. I got hosed for 75 for duty and taxes (but I asked and got free shipping) which sucks but it still came to 290, which is much cheaper than BPS 100 mph suit at 500+ Supposed to be the best raingear there is. Landry
Thanks Landry! I was in the market for new rainwear. Free shipping and had the items sent to the UPS Store in Lewiston NY for pick up.  Total was $215. That is an unbelievable deal.

That is an awesome deal! I was lucky enough to get a gander mtn suite similar to that before they were discontinued. Shipped to pt huron free and brought it over.  Its crazy the BPS one is over $500 here.
thnx  240 for parka and bibs in tall 3x 50 cent shipping free tackle bag...   what a deal!!!!!
Hey guys, are those the insulated ones? Thanks  Just found the non-insulated sets. Sorry
The insulated ones are on sale too.  Forgot to mention the free tackle bag.
Insulated an not insulated  Tall and regular sizes
their tournament spinning reels are also on sale. Great reels that rival stradics in quality at 39.00usd
any idea on how big a person the 3x will fit?

I'm 6 foot 4 inches...  275 at least... And the 3x should be be big on me... The cabelas  web. Site has a size chart... So if you know your messurments... Your good to go...  I chose I size up from my shirt size so I can layer up...
The tall pants are 33 inseam and the jackets are 2 inches longer and 1.5 inch longer sleeves...
thanks mike, found the chart and got my order..
Thanks for the heads up! Ordered the rainsuit and a few other items. Even with the duty and all, paid less then I would ever expect to pay for just the Gortex suit.
Thanks for the heads up. I've been holding off on this purchase for a while now.   Decided not to pass this one up.  Cheers!
you guys wont be dissapointed.  i bought the guidewear jacket a few years ago and it works great.. without the gawdy NASCAResque BPS advertising.  My bibs are BPS and they work good too.
I've seen them also and they are top notch.  Big props to the OP for letting everyone know. I'd grab some if I was in the market too.
Wow, that's a no brainer.  Great deal.

Great deal to be had there! Keep in mind that there's a sale for them at this time every year, I the uninsulated jacket 2 falls ago for under 120! I still need goretex bibs, will look into that for next year.
Nothing like a great deal and sharing the wealth is what this site is all about! Wish I could have shipped to the U.S and saved 75 bucks like some of you guys did!!!! Landry
Nobody beats the Wiz errrr Cabela's...NOBODY.......that's why I am a Signature Card Holder from Cabela's...  Bob (who drives in the middle "safer not safe" lane....LOL)

Thanks for the heads up , great deal ! I am going to get a pair but I am unsure about the sizing on these things ,some things you have to order a bit bigger but I don't have any idea on these suits. For those that have the suit could you please help me out , i'm 5'7 " and have a 35" waist. Thanks
Couple tourney reels ordered, great deal for a Daiwa.  thanks OP for the heads up.
Received my Guidewear order yesterday.  Looks great!   The tackle/boat bag is really nice too!  Thanks again.  Cheers!

Yup... The suit  and bag and shipping would have been over 600 50 cent shipping 60 dollar tackle bag free 270 after shipping and taxes...  Very pleased with the suit... But it's been to nice out to use it... Lol
that was quick, clicked on their international shipping on my reels and was 2-3 weeks  was yours sent here or you pick up by the border?
